blogPost.title: The African Continental Free Trade Area ties together the biggest number of member countries of any trade agreement since the establishment of the World Trade Organisation in 1995 https://t.co/2NvNHyMIXC
blogPost.author: The Economist

localize.full_text: 自1995年世界贸易组织成立以来，非洲大陆自由贸易区的成员国数量是所有贸易协定中最多的，https://t.co/2NvNHyMIXC。
自1995年世界貿易組織成立以來，非洲大陸自由貿易區的成員國數量是所有貿易協定中最多的，https://t.co/2NvNHyMIXC。

previous.title: This week the world reached 100m recorded cases of covid-19. On current trends, cases will double again in 105 days. With the true total likely to be far higher, vaccinations still have a long way to go https://t.co/s6LI5z6k7X https://t.co/EFR64M9z6r

localize.full_text: 本周，世界上记录的covid-19病例达到1亿例。按照目前的趋势，病例数将在105天内再次翻倍。由于真正的总数可能会更高，疫苗接种仍有很长的路要走https://t.co/s6LI5z6k7X https://t.co/EFR64M9z6r。
本週，世界上記錄的covid-19病例達到1億例。按照目前的趨勢，病例數將在105天內再次翻倍。由於真正的總數可能會更高，疫苗接種仍有很長的路要走https://t.co/s6LI5z6k7X https://t.co/EFR64M9z6r。
